description: The procurement is a REOI for leasehold interest in land located at 7127 Lotus Court, Las Vegas, Nevada with adjoining land parcels all north of M Resort and M Pavilion. Bullrider calls the site ''Balance Lot.'  Overall, the right-of-way prospects for Lotus properties are: one OR&R restricted site, seven (7) sites in Regional Trails System with maximum four-lane development allowed, and six (6) multifamily, commercial, and industrial zones with a full permitting and max density allowed (See specific zones below:)
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for RFSO Electrical Services**
================iros Entertainment Services at various Crown Buildings in Iqaluit, NU
-------------------------------------------------

**Title**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* English: RFSO Electrical Services at various Crown buildings in Iqaluit, NU
* French: DOC services électrique divers édifices de la Couronne à Iqaluit (Nunavut)

**Reference Number** : PW-_PWZ-202-11369
**Solicitation Number**: EW999-220560/A
**Publication Date**: September 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: September 29, 2022, 15:00:00

**Overview**
--------

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) solicits Inuit firms on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) to provide electrical services for various Crown buildings in Iqaluit, Nunavut. The winning firm will receive a standing offer for a term of five years, with estimated annual usage of $73,500 (GST/HST included).

**Service Requirements**
--------------------

The contract will involve the provision of skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials for electrical services at various Crown buildings. Services must be provided on an "as requested" basis.

**Evaluation and Selection**
-------------------------

The RFSO will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The winning firm will be selected based on the highest combined rating.

**Compliance with Mandatory Requirements**
-----------------------------------------

The tender package includes mandatory requirements that must be met by all bidders. Failure to comply may result in rejection of the bid.

**Additional Information**
----------------------

The tender package also includes:

* A copy of the Agreement Between Inuit of the Nunavut Settlement Area and Her Majesty the Queen in Right of Canada (the Nunavut Agreement)
* The Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) list
* The Inuit Procurement Standard Terms and Conditions

**Submission Instructions**
-------------------------

Bid documents can be obtained from the GETS service provider on the Government of Canada website. Bidders must submit their proposals in the specified format and within the specified time frame.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information, please contact:
Valerie Thompson
Public Works and Government Services Canada
Phone: (204) 509-0349
Fax: (418) 566-6167
Email: [valerie.thompson@pwgsc-tpsgc
